item.name: Adamantine Brass Knuckles
item.text:
Unarmed: When you make an unarmed attack you can choose to deal the damage of this weapon instead of your normal unarmed attack damage.
Whenever you hit an object with this weapon, the hit is a critical hit.
Proficiency: simple, knuckles Source: Xanathar's Guide to Everything p. 78, Player's Handbook (2014) p. 149
